snippet: An Illinois woman made police work easy when she allegedly stole a colorful, leopard-pattern dress from a small boutique, then posted a picture of herself wearing it on Facebook, police said on Monday....

headline.print_headline: Facebook 'Selfie' Leads to Shoplifting Arrest in Illinois: Police
headline.main: Facebook 'Selfie' Leads to Shoplifting Arrest in Illinois: Police

lead_paragraph: An Illinois woman made police work easy when she allegedly stole a colorful, leopard-pattern dress from a small boutique, then posted a picture of herself wearing it on Facebook, police said on Monday.
